utils

Class RndUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.RndUtil

  • public class RndUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    class controlling random number generation.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: Parallel optimization library for Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

    Company: AIT
